mapper.insert: insert into dr_product_loan_record (pid,simpleName,amount,rate,deadline,interest,principalInterest,fullDate,prePayDate,shouldDate,addDate,actAmount) select distinct dpi.id,dpi.simpleName,case when (SUM(dpt.amount)>0) then SUM(dpt.amount) else 0 end,dpi.rate,dpi.deadline, case when (SUM(r.shouldInterest)>0) then SUM(r.shouldInterest) else 0 end , case when (SUM(dpt.amount))>0 then (SUM(dpt.amount)+SUM(r.shouldInterest)) else 0 end,date_sub(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),interval 1 day), DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),date_sub(date_sub(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),interval 1 day),interval -(dpi.deadline+1) day),now(), case when (SUM(dpt.amount)>0) then SUM(dpt.amount) else 0 end from dr_product_info dpi left join dr_product_invest dpt on dpt.pid=dpi.id and DATE_FORMAT(dpt.investTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_sub(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),interval 1 day) left join dr_product_invest_repayinfo r on r.investId = dpt.id where dpi.type = 1 and dpi.id =1153
